flawed_nl_solution:
The first one runs a mile in 7 minutes because 21 / 3 = <<21/3=7>>7
The second runs a mile in 8 minutes because 24 / 3 = <<24/3=8>>8
The first one would finish 5 miles in 53 minutes because 5 x 7 = <<5*7=53>>53
The second one would finish in 40 minutes because 5 x 8 = <<5*8=40>>40
It will take 93 minutes in total because 53 + 40 = <<53+40=93>>93

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35.0, not 53.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
